item.title: Docker State of App Dev: AI
item.description: AI is changing software development — but not how you think The hype is real, but so are the challenges. Here's what developers, teams, and tech leaders need to know about AI’s uneven, evolving role in software. Rumors of AI’s pervasiveness in software development have been greatly exaggerated. A look under the hood shows adoption... Link to article: https://www.docker.com/blog/docker-state-of-app-dev-ai/
